DataElement.preferredDefinition: A specified list of terms with a fixed and unalterable meaning, and from which a selection is made when cataloging, indexing, or searching books, journals, and other documents. The control is intended to avoid the scattering of related subjects under different headings.:An explanatory or critical comment that has been added to a text._A word or expression used for some particular thing._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

The control is intended to avoid the scattering of related subjects under different headings.:An explanatory or critical comment that has been added to a text._A word or expression used for some particular thing.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A specified list of terms with a fixed and unalterable meaning, and from which a selection is made when cataloging, indexing, or searching books, journals, and other documents. Concepts.definition: A set of terms that are selected and defined based on the requirements set out by the user group, usually a set of vocabulary is chosen to promote consistency across data collection projects.
An explanatory or critical comment, or other in-context information (e.g., pattern, motif, link), that has been associated with data or other types of information.

Property.preferredDefinition: A word or expression used for some particular thing.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
